bibl.title: Roman Portraits, Artistic and Literary. Acts of the Third International Conference on the Roman Portraits held in Prague and in the Bechyne Castle from 25 to 29 September 1989
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 70 (1998), Bibl. Beilage 2, p. 79.
BONACASA Nicola, Aspetti e problemi della ritrattistica tardo-antica in Egitto.

Jan BOUZEK and Iva ONDREJOVÁ (Edd.), Roman Portraits, Artistic and Literary. Acts of the Third International Conference on the Roman Portraits held in Prague and in the Bechyne Castle from 25 to 29 September 1989 (Mainz am Rhein, 1997) pp. 65-67 et pll.
